name: Meatifyme
body:
### Beta Testers
If you're willing to test this game join our [G+ community](https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/108591828744392169850).
Then follow these steps:

```
Search for the "About this community"
Click "MeatifyMe opt-in" link
Opt-in for alpha releases of the game
```

### Developers
If you're wondering how we did this game and other game related features just head to our repository and search our code! Any suggestion is highly appreciated.  

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with MeatifyMe? Feel free to contact Francisco Couceiro (@fcouceiro)!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
